Package Animal

Class Prey

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Drawable.Drawable
Animal.Animal
Animal.Prey
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Prey extends Animal
Class that represents preys

This class is responsible for calculating prey's movement and searching for places to go

    • Prey

      public Prey(String _name, int _speed, int _strength, String _species_name, int _x_cord, int _y_cord, int _health, int _water_level, int _fullness, Board _board, boolean is_hidden)
      Constructor of Prey class
      Parameters:
      _name - name of an animal
      _speed - speed of an animal
      _strength - animal's strength
      _species_name - animal's species name
      _x_cord - x cordinate
      _y_cord - y cordinate
      _health - starting (max) health of an animal
      _water_level - starting (max) water level of an animal
      _fullness - starting (max) food level of an animal
      _board - board on which animal is supposed to move
      is_hidden - true if animal is created in hideout, false otherwise

    • run

      public void run()
      Run method overriden from Thread, while alive prey will: -die if water or food level below zero -go to hideout/stay in one if not hungry and not thirsty -go to resource/stay in one if hungry or thirsty
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread
